mapper.insert: insert into gd_shop_deliver (deliver_id, shop_id, deliver_mode_name, update_time) values (#{deliverId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{shopId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deliverModeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into gd_shop_deliver
deliver_id,
shop_id,
deliver_mode_name,
update_time,
#{deliverId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{shopId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{deliverModeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.select:
select
from gd_shop_deliver where update_time < #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and update_time >= #{beginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} order by shop_id
